REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1475 reute r f BC-CYCLOPS-<CYL>-MERGER 06-29 0071

TEXT.TITLE: CYCLOPS <CYL> MERGER APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Cyclops Corp said shareholders approved a previously announced merger of the company with a subsidiary of dixons Group PLC. It said Dixons held about 83 pct of Cyclops stock following a tender offer and other purchases earlier in the year. With the completion of the transaction, Dixons will proceed to pay 95 dlrs a share to the remaining Cyclops shareholders. Reuter
